name: Menses: The Game
description:
Menses: The Game is all about the destigmatization and normalization of periods, period hygiene products, and providing visibility to the struggles people with ovaries face. 

This game was created in 24 hours for American University and University of Miami's Newsjam 2019 by:

Hazel Arroyo (American University, MA candidate) - Programming and Design

Molly Eisenback (American University, MA candidate) - Programming and Design

Katy Huang (University of Miami, MFA Candidate) - Artistic Lead and UI Design

Jocelyn Wagner (American University, MFA candidate) - Design and Research

Andrew Moger (American University, MFA candidate)  - Design, Research, and Audio
